_instructions: Copy this file to 'featured_queries.json' and customize with domain-specific example queries
_documentation: Defines showcase queries that demonstrate your domain's capabilities

featured_queries.title: Domain Overview Analysis
featured_queries.query: Provide a comprehensive overview of the key trends and statistics in our domain. Include visualizations and data summaries.
featured_queries.description: High-level analysis showcasing multiple data sources and visualization capabilities

featured_queries.title: Detailed Comparative Analysis
featured_queries.query: Compare performance metrics across different categories. Show trends over time and highlight key insights with supporting data.
featured_queries.description: In-depth comparative analysis with time-series data and insights

finance.title: Portfolio Risk Assessment
finance.query: Analyze the risk profile of my technology stock portfolio. Show sector diversification, volatility metrics, and correlation analysis with market indices.
finance.description: Comprehensive portfolio risk analysis with diversification insights

finance.title: Market Trend Analysis
finance.query: Show current market trends for renewable energy stocks. Include price movements, volume analysis, and correlation with ESG factors.
finance.description: Market trend analysis focusing on sustainable investments

environmental.title: Regional Air Quality Assessment
environmental.query: Analyze air quality trends in major metropolitan areas over the past 5 years. Show pollutant levels, seasonal patterns, and policy impact analysis.
environmental.description: Comprehensive air quality analysis with trend identification and policy correlation

environmental.title: Climate Change Impact Analysis
environmental.query: Assess climate change impacts on agricultural regions. Include temperature trends, precipitation changes, and crop yield correlations.
environmental.description: Climate impact analysis focusing on agricultural implications

healthcare.title: Drug Efficacy Comparison
healthcare.query: Compare the efficacy rates of diabetes medications approved in the last 5 years. Include side effect profiles and cost-effectiveness analysis.
healthcare.description: Comprehensive pharmaceutical analysis with efficacy and safety comparisons

healthcare.title: Clinical Trial Trend Analysis
healthcare.query: Analyze trends in oncology clinical trials. Show geographic distribution, funding sources, and success rates by cancer type.
healthcare.description: Clinical research trend analysis with geographic and funding insights

effective_queries: Be specific about the type of analysis desired
Ask for supporting data and citations

query_components.scope: Define what to analyze (entities, regions, time periods)
query_components.analysis_type: Specify comparison, trend, overview, or detailed analysis
query_components.visualizations: Request specific chart types or visual representations
